message.content: First, calculate total distance: 120km + 180km = 300km. Next, calculate total time: 2h + 3h = 5h. Finally, average speed = total distance / total time = 300km / 5h = 60 km/h.

200.description: API Key status and usage info

post.description: Generates one or more images from a text prompt.

value.prompt: A beautiful sunset over the mountains in an anime art style.

previous_response_id.description: ID of the previous response to continue a conversation.

reasoning.description: Optional reasoning parameters for advanced problem solving.

model.description: The model to use for image generation.

prompt.description: A text description of the desired image(s). The maximum length is 1000 characters.

n.description: The number of images to generate.

size.description: The size of the generated images.

response_format.description: The format in which the generated images are returned.

steps.description: The number of inference steps to perform.

id.description: A unique identifier for the image generation request.

created.description: The timestamp of when the image was created.

model.description: The model used for the image generation.

data.description: A list of generated image objects.

usage.description: Token usage information for the request.

url.description: The URL of the generated image. Will be null if `response_format` is `b64_json`.

b64_json.description: The base64 encoded JSON of the generated image. Will be null if `response_format` is `url`.
